actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide a remote maintenance allowance to certain officers and employees of the United States assigned to Johnson Island.

summary.text: Provides for a remote maintenance allowance to an employee of an executive department or an independent establishment who is assigned duty, except temporary duty, at Johnston Island.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide a remote maintenance allowance to certain officers and employees of the United States assigned to Johnson Island.
